Package org.objectweb.cjdbc.console.wizard

C-JDBC wizard, to create virtual database configuration files.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
WizardConstants The constants used throughout the XmlWizard
WizardTab This is the asbtract class used to define tabs in the wizard.
WizardTabs This is a JTabbedPane used to contain all the tabs define in the org.objectweb.cjdbc.console.wizard.tab package.
XmlValidatorFrame Used to report results of validating a database xml configuration file.
XmlWizard This is the main class for the XmlWizard.
 

Package org.objectweb.cjdbc.console.wizard Description

C-JDBC wizard, to create virtual database configuration files.
